pascal.walkthroughs.delphiLike.descripti:
Make VS Code look and feel like Delphi. Use classic Delphi Themes and take advantage of your muscle memory with Delphi Keybindings
[Install Delphi Themes](command:_pascal.installDelphiThemes)
[Install Delphi Keymap](command:_pascal.installDelphiKeymap)
